inclusion.criterion: Patient for elective abdominal surgery from 20 years (yrs) to 65 yrs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists criteria 1 or 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient in the supine position with arm available for neuromuscular monitoring during operation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients expected to have a difficult airway
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to one of the drugs used in this protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: intake of any medication that might interact with muscle relaxants
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 3-day-old Asian female infant presents with jaundice that started a day ago. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
